title: Inquire About Photography Policy
description: A visitor wants to know if flash photography is allowed inside an art museum.

tasks.description: Identify the attraction (art museum) and the query (flash photography).
Retrieve the museum's photography policy from its knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the policy which states that non-flash photography is allowed, but flash is strictly prohibited.

tasks.description: Clearly communicate the policy to the visitor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately explains that flash photography is not permitted.
